text: Ndiye amene adakusankhani kukhala oweruza pa dziko. Kotero aliyense amene sakhulupirira, kusakhulupirira kwake kudzamupweteka yekha. Ndipo kusakhulupirira kwawo sikuonjezera china chilichonse kwa Ambuye wawo kupatula chidani chokha. Ndipo kusakhulupirira kwawo sikuonjezera china chilichonse kwa iwo kupatula kutayika
